titles.title: 818 Let Jesus come into your heart

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
If you are tired of the Load of your sin
Let Jesus come
Into your heart
If you desire a new Life to begin
Let Jesus come
Into your heart

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Just now, your doubtings Give over
Just now, reject Him no more
Just now, throw Open the door
Let Jesus come
Into your heart

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
If 'tis for purity now That you sigh
Let Jesus come
Into your heart
Fountains for cleansing Are flowing nearby
Let Jesus come
Into your heart

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
If there's a tempest your Voice cannot still
Let Jesus come
Into your heart
If there's a void this World can never fill
Let Jesus come
Into your heart

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
If you would join the glad Songs of the blest
Let Jesus come
Into your heart
If you would enter the Mansions of rest
Let Jesus come
Into your heart
